meta-review.comment: Like A Dragon Infinite Wealth is a delightful romp through the world of finance and strategy, wrapped in the trappings of a fun and quirky RPG. Dive into a world where you can become the ultimate financial tycoon while battling colorful characters and overcoming absurd challenges. The game's unique blend of financial simulation and classic RPG elements will keep you entertained for hours on end. Get ready to build your empire and conquer the financial world!
